Text:
Hmm, first I'm hearing of this comic, is it any good?

Regardless, THANKS! xD +1

I have only read the first trade paperback, and it was good. Nothing world-changing and probably boring for some people.

The story I read was basically a boy-meets-girl story for Gen Y people. My wife loves it. Its publication is a little sporadic -- 15 issues in 2 years.
Cool, I'll grab the available ones and check it out. Thanks!
